The confirmation from the White House: The expert's verdict mentions that the White House confirmed that the photo was taken on March 12 during the signing ceremony of the American Rescue Plan. This confirmation adds credibility to the claim.
Comparison with Associated Press images: The expert notes that the image in question shows House Speaker Nancy Pelosi in the same pink dress, President Joe Biden in a blue suit, and Vice President Kamala Harris and Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer both wearing black. This comparison with Associated Press images helps verify the authenticity of the claim.
Disproving the location claim: The expert's verdict mentions that the building seen in the background of the photo is not the Center Parc Credit Union Stadium as claimed in the post. Instead, it is identified as the Eisenhower executive office building, which is located next to the White House. This disproves the claim made in the Facebook post.
Facebook: s flagging and partnership: The expert mentions that the post was flagged as part of Facebook's efforts to combat false news and misinformation. This indicates that the claim was recognized as potentially false, and the fact that the expert is working in partnership with Facebook adds credibility to their verdict.
